description: This update documents our first Public Disgrace shoot in Europe! Lea Lexis is a total exhibitionist who loves public sex, so that made her the perfect candidate for this new adventure! It was always Lea's fantasy to get fucked by the castle, so that is exactly where we take her. The shoot starts off quick with Lea restrained in metal shackles and giving a blowjob in the courtyard of the castle. Then she is chained to a post, ball gagged, and left for people to observe. Apparently, the castle was a little too high profile a place for public sex, so we had to relocate to somewhere a little less famous! Join now to find out where we go next!
title: Lea Lexis
